apple_vendor_description: This rendition of the woman with white hair on Apple devices features a dignified and serene individual with medium-light skin tone. Apple's design language imbues her with a gentle, realistic appearance, showcasing soft gradients and nuanced lighting that highlight her flowing white hair and calm expression. The overall impression is one of wisdom and experience, making this emoji a thoughtful choice to represent elders, mentors, or anyone embodying grace and maturity within your Apple communications.
